extension_desc.message: Brings back image features from Opera 12

plural_rule_zero.description: CLDR plural rules. Copy the rules for your language from https://github.com/santhoshtr/CLDRPluralRuleParser/blob/master/data/plurals.json. If your language does not use a plural group, use an empty string.

thousands_separator.description: Character used to separate groups of three digits in large numbers

by.description: Appears on the options page as 'By [Extension Author]'

ctx_image_properties.description: Text for the context menu item

title_options_page_tab.description: Tab title for the options page

title_image_properties.description: Title of the the image properties pop-up

title_image_actions.description: Title for the options page: image downloading actions

title_if_downloads_fail.message: If images fail to download on certain sites
title_if_downloads_fail.description: Title for the options page: image download workaround

title_restricted_domains.description: Title for the text field where a user may enter a list of domains to which the download workaround should be applied

title_credits.description: Title for the options page: credits section

info_if_downloads_fail.message: The Save as... action uses an extension API which sometimes fails on sites which prevent hotlinking. If a download fails with the error, Interrupted: Server Problem, add the site to the list below. This enables a workaround which usually fixes the problem, but the save dialog and download progress will not appear until the image is fully downloaded.
info_if_downloads_fail.description: Description for the image download workaround

info_special_patterns.message: The following special patterns may be used
info_special_patterns.description: Precedes a listing of special codes that may be used for the image download workaround

warn_no_downloads_api.message: The Save as... action will not work because your browser does not support the downloads API. For full functionality, use Opera 20 or later.
warn_no_downloads_api.description: Message which appears on the options page when the downloads API is unsupported

alt.description: The Alt key on a keyboard

ctrl.description: The Ctrl key on a keyboard

shift.description: The Shift key on a keyboard

click.description: Action performed when pressing a mouse button

save_as.description: Option which opens a file dialog when saving an image

save_to_downloads.description: Option which saves images directly to the downloads folder

browser_default.description: Option which leaves the browser behavior unchanged

zero_or_more_chars.message: Zero or more of any character
zero_or_more_chars.description: Pattern description for * which matches zero or more characters

bracketed_chars_optional.description: Pattern description for [abc] where the characters inside brackets may or may not be present

any_subdomain.description: Pattern description for [*.] which is a useful form of the bracket pattern that matches any website's domain or subdomain

tab_general.description: Tab title for the image properties pop-up. Refers to info used by all image types.

tab_metadata.description: Tab title for the image properties pop-up. Refers to data embedded within an image, such as Exif data.

prop_header_width.description: Width of the property headers on the image properties pop-up

prop_bitdepth.description: Header for the image bit depth

val_bitdepth.description: Value for the image bit depth

unknown.description: Displayed for $format$ in val_imagetype when the format cannot be determined from the MIME type

prop_filesize.description: Header for the image file size

val_filesize.description: Value for the image file size

prop_animation.description: Header for the image animation data

val_animation_duration.description: Value for the image animation data with duration

val_animation.description: Value for the image animation data without duration

cnt_frames.description: Number of frames in an animation. List CLDR plural forms in order zero;one;two;few;many;other. Omit plural forms not used by your language.

cnt_seconds.description: Unit of time. List CLDR plural forms in order zero;one;two;few;many;other. Omit plural forms not used by your language.

analyzing.description: Displayed for an image property when the value is not yet available because Classic Images is still analyzing the image

close.description: Text for the button which closes a pop-up

error_load_failed.description: Displayed on the image properties pop-up when the image could not be loaded

error_analyze_failed.description: Displayed on the image properties pop-up when the image could not be analyzed
